          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat losses from a house</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeverlust von einem Haus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pertes de chaleur d'une maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perdas de calor de uma casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perdite di calore da una casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απώλειες θερμότητας από ένα σπίτι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pérdidas de calor de una casa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows four possible ways that heat energy can escape from the house.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">house</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">keeping warm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt vier möglichen 
Möglichkeiten, daß Wärmeenergie vom Haus entgehen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve à quatre voies possibles que 
l'énergie calorifique peut s'échapper de la maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a quatro maneiras possíveis
que a energia de calor pode se escapar da casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica a quattro modi possibili che
l'energia termica può fuoriuscire dalla casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τέσσερις πιθανούς 
τρόπους ότι η ενέργεια θερμότητας μπορεί να δραπετεύσει από το 
σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra a cuatro maneras posibles 
que la energía térmica puede escaparse de la casa.</string>
          </description>
